64. $y=\cfrac{(x^2-4x+3)(x-1)}{|x-1|}=\begin{cases} x^2-4x+3,\ x>1,\\ -x^2+4x-3,\ x<1.\end{cases}$
$$% TIKZ_ID{task064-solution-fig1}
